Companies with Entry Level Jobs and Internships in Marketing A degree in marketing or a related field is helpful to get started in marketing, but more useful than the major are your ability to think critically and communicate, both orally and in writing. Mathematical and computer literacy are also helpful, especially for research positions. Public Relations Associate Market Research Analyst Copywriter Online Marketing Specialist Marketing Associate Account Coordinator Marketing touches every product you use, from market research to selling the end product. Because of this marketing jobs are available in almost every industry out there that sells a product. Some of the big umbrellas of marketing you can get involved in include market research, public relations, and advertising. Internet marketing is also a growing field. While a lot of job titles
